results.title: The Queen's Corgi
results.creator_credit: nWave Pictures, Belga Productions, Ben Stassen, John R. Smith, Rob Sprackling, Caroline Van Iseghem and Vincent Kesteloot
results.brief_description: When the Queen’s favourite dog, Rex, becomes lost, he must make new friends and embrace new adventures in order to find his way back to the palace.

constellations_other.name: Royalty, royalty, royalty
constellations_other.description: Fascination with the royal family has persisted over the years, as seen through newsreels, documentaries, films, TV shows, tabloid news and satire.

results.creator_credit_for_label: nWave Pictures, Belga Productions, Ben Stassen, John R. Smith, Rob Sprackling, Caroline Van Iseghem and Vincent Kesteloot
results.description: Since his arrival at Buckingham palace, Rex lives a life of luxury. Top dog, he has superseded his three fellow Corgis in Her Majesty’s heart. His arrogance can be quite irritating. When he causes a diplomatic incident during an official dinner with the President of the United States, he falls into disgrace. Betrayed by one of his peers, Rex becomes a stray dog in the streets of London. How can he redeem himself? In love, he will find the resources to surpass himself in the face of great danger…
description_for_label: Since his arrival at Buckingham palace, Rex lives a life of luxury. Top dog, he has superseded his three fellow Corgis in Her Majesty’s heart. His arrogance can be quite irritating. When he causes a diplomatic incident during an official dinner with the President of the United States, he falls into disgrace. Betrayed by one of his peers, Rex becomes a stray dog in the streets of London. How can he redeem himself? In love, he will find the resources to surpass himself in the face of great danger…

results.title: The Queen
results.creator_credit: BIM Distribuzione, Granada Film Productions, Scott Rudin Productions, Future Films, Pathé Pictures International, Pathé Renn Productions, Canal+, France 3 Cinéma, Consolata Boyle, Alan MacDonald, Andy Harries, Stephen Frears, Christine Langan, Peter Morgan and Tracey Seaward
results.headline_credit: France, Italy, United Kingdom and United States of America, 2006
results.brief_description: The Queen is an intimate behind the scenes glimpse at the interaction between HM Elizabeth II and Prime Minister Tony Blair during their struggle, following the death of Diana, to reach a compromise between what was a private tragedy for the Royal family and the public’s demand for an overt display of mourning.

constellations_other.name: Royalty, royalty, royalty
constellations_other.description: Fascination with the royal family has persisted over the years, as seen through newsreels, documentaries, films, TV shows, tabloid news and satire.

results.title: The Proposition
results.brief_description: Set in the Australian outback in the 1880s, the movie follows the series of events following the horrific rape and murder of the Hopkins family, allegedly committed by the infamous Burns brothers gang. Captain Morris Stanley captures Charlie Burns and gives him 9 days to kill his older dangerous psychopathic brother, or else they’ll hang his younger mentally slow brother on Christmas Day.

constellations_other.name: Outlaws and the end
constellations_other.description: Tracing connections from Sweet Country to Australian westerns and resistance to white colonial narratives.

results.description: Set in the Australian outback in the 1880s, the movie follows the series of events following the horrific rape and murder of the Hopkins family, allegedly committed by the infamous Burns brothers gang. Captain Morris Stanley captures Charlie Burns and gives him 9 days to kill his older dangerous psychopathic brother, or else they’ll hang his younger mentally slow brother on Christmas Day.

creators_other.name: National Lottery through UK Film Council

results.title: The Producers
results.brief_description: Broadway producer, Max Bialystock and his accountant, Leo Bloom plan to make money by charming little old ladies to invest in a production many times over what it will actually cost, and then put on a sure-fire flop, so nobody will ask for their money back – and what can be a more certain flop than a tasteless musical celebrating Hitler.

constellations_other.name: Undercutting extremism with absurdity
constellations_other.description: Taika Waititi's satirical performance as Adolf Hitler in Jojo Rabbit connects to a number of other portrayals that includes ill-fated (and conceived) TV shows, memes, high camp and cinema classics.

results.description: Broadway producer, Max Bialystock and his accountant, Leo Bloom plan to make money by charming little old ladies to invest in a production many times over what it will actually cost, and then put on a sure-fire flop, so nobody will ask for their money back – and what can be a more certain flop than a tasteless musical celebrating Hitler.

results.title: The Princess Diaries
results.creator_credit: Bottom of the Ninth Productions, Walt Disney Pictures, BrownHouse Productions, Mayne Berke, Garry Marshall, Whitney Houston, Mario Iscovich, Debra Martin Chase and Gina Wendkos
results.brief_description: A socially awkward but very bright 15-year-old girl being raised by a single mom discovers that she is the princess of a small European country because of the recent death of her long-absent father, who, unknown to her, was the crown prince of Genovia. She must make a choice between continuing the life of a San Francisco teen or stepping up to the throne.

constellations_other.name: Princesses, rom-coms and sit-coms
constellations_other.description: Newsreel footage was captured on large, bulky 35mm cameras like the Mitchell Newsreel Camera by operators in the field, but they were also used by film production companies and on TV shows, with some of those involved going on to define different genres.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Bottom of the Ninth Productions, Walt Disney Pictures, BrownHouse Productions, Mayne Berke, Garry Marshall, Whitney Houston, Mario Iscovich, Debra Martin Chase and Gina Wendkos

She must make a choice between continuing the life of a San Francisco teen or stepping up to the throne.

results.title: The Princess and the Frog
results.brief_description: A waitress, desperate to fulfill her dreams as a restaurant owner, is set on a journey to turn a frog prince back into a human being, but she has to face the same problem after she kisses him.

constellations_other.name: Stop-motion and animation superstars
constellations_other.description: Despite the ease of new technology and a legacy going back to the beginning of cinema, stop-motion animation techniques are as popular as ever.

results.description: A waitress, desperate to fulfill her dreams as a restaurant owner, is set on a journey to turn a frog prince back into a human being, but she has to face the same problem after she kisses him.

results.title: The Prestige
results.brief_description: Hugh Jackman and Christian Bale star as a pair of duelling illusionists in this mind-bending period drama from visionary director Christopher Nolan.
results.description: A mysterious story of two magicians whose intense rivalry leads them on a life-long battle for supremacy — full of obsession, deceit and jealousy with dangerous and deadly consequences.
description_for_label: A mysterious story of two magicians whose intense rivalry leads them on a life-long battle for supremacy — full of obsession, deceit and jealousy with dangerous and deadly consequences.

results.title: The Post
results.creator_credit: 20th Century Fox, DreamWorks Pictures, Reliance Entertainment, TSG Entertainment, Participant Media, Amblin Entertainment, Pascal Pictures, Star Thrower Entertainment, Ann Roth, Steven Spielberg, Rick Carter, Josh Singer, Kristie Macosko Krieger, Amy Pascal and Liz Hannah
results.brief_description: A cover-up that spanned four U.S. Presidents pushed the country’s first female newspaper publisher and a hard-driving editor to join an unprecedented battle between journalist and government. Inspired by true events.

constellations_other.name: Uncovering the truth
constellations_other.description: The images of Tank Man during the Tiananmen Square protests in 1989 were captured by photojournalists and shared around the world. The work of journalists has been key to uncovering abuses of power and are rich material for fictional and factual movies and TV.

results.creator_credit_for_label: 20th Century Fox, DreamWorks Pictures, Reliance Entertainment, TSG Entertainment, Participant Media, Amblin Entertainment, Pascal Pictures, Star Thrower Entertainment, Ann Roth, Steven Spielberg, Rick Carter, Josh Singer, Kristie Macosko Krieger, Amy Pascal and Liz Hannah
results.description: A cover-up that spanned four U.S. Presidents pushed the country’s first female newspaper publisher and a hard-driving editor to join an unprecedented battle between journalist and government. Inspired by true events.

results.title: The Player
results.brief_description: Robert Altman’s adaptation of Michael Tolkin’s 1988 novel skewers the Hollywood film industry in a searing, satirical black comedy about a studio executive driven to murder.

constellations_other.name: Sound and Hollywood
constellations_other.description: The impact of sound on Tinsel Town stretches from the beginning of cinema to recent award-winners, as well as the biggest band in K-Pop.

results.description:
The Player is a 1992 American satirical black comedy film directed by Robert Altman and written by Michael Tolkin, based on his own 1988 novel of the same name. The film stars Tim Robbins, Greta Scacchi, Fred Ward, Whoopi Goldberg, Peter Gallagher, Brion James, Cynthia Stevenson and is the story of a Hollywood film studio executive who kills an aspiring screenwriter he believes is sending him death threats.

  • Wikipedia
description_for_label:

The film stars Tim Robbins, Greta Scacchi, Fred Ward, Whoopi Goldberg, Peter Gallagher, Brion James, Cynthia Stevenson and is the story of a Hollywood film studio executive who kills an aspiring screenwriter he believes is sending him death threats.

  • Wikipedia

results.title: The Play House
results.brief_description: The Play House is a 1921 American two-reel silent comedy film written, directed by, and starring Buster Keaton. The movie runs for 22 minutes, and is most famous for an opening sequence in which Keaton plays every role.

constellations_other.name: Clones, doubles and doppelgangers
constellations_other.description: Multiple characters and doubles materialise in this Constellation inspired by the pioneering special effects of Georges Méliès.
